Reviews.Title: Retired and a daily internet user.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I find the 255 from HP to be one of the best computers I have ever owned. I was afraid of Win 8 because of all the bad publicity I received from friends and other users. I like Win 8 and I was a lover of Win XP. I thought I would never like the system. Boy was I wrong. Im a lover of this PC, it does all I will ever need to do and then some. I recommend it to everyone needing an inexpensive laptop. I have nothing bad to say about it.  A VERY GOOD BUY FOR SCHOOL OR COLLEGE

Reviews.Title: great product and retailer
Reviews.Author: Andrew Aron
Reviews.Content: everything went well, computer is as good as can be expected and more, very pleased.  Company also was very resonsive, i would deal with them again in a heartbeat.
